actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the education of the dependents of persons engaged in the construction of additional hydroelectric power facilities at Chief Joseph Dam and Reservoir, Wash.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to provide education services for the dependents of persons engaged in the construction of the Chief Joseph Dam and Reservoir in Washington.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the education of the dependents of persons engaged in the construction of additional hydroelectric power facilities at Chief Joseph Dam and Reservoir, Wash.
